results.name: Bulbasaur

vitals.ability: Overgrow: When HP is below 1/3, the power of Grass-type moves increases 1.5x.

results.description: Bulbasaur is a strong, manageable Pokémon for beginning trainers. No one's sure whether Bulbasaur and its evolutions are plants or animals, as they seem to have the characteristics of both.

results.name: Ivysaur

vitals.ability: Overgrow: When HP is below 1/3, the power of Grass-type moves increases 1.5x.

results.description: Ivysaur is the evolved form of Bulbasaur. Its bud has bloomed into a large flower, and it spends more time soaking up the sun's rays.

results.name: Venusaur

vitals.ability: Overgrow: When HP is below 1/3, the power of Grass-type moves increases 1.5x.

results.description: Venusaur is the final evolution of Bulbasaur. Its flower is in full bloom, and it is said to absorb energy from the sunlight to grow even stronger.

results.name: Charmander

vitals.ability: Blaze: When HP is below 1/3, the power of Fire-type moves increases 1.5x.

results.description: Charmander is a small, bipedal lizard-like Pokémon. Its flame at the tip of its tail indicates its health and mood.

results.name: Charmeleon

vitals.ability: Blaze: When HP is below 1/3, the power of Fire-type moves increases 1.5x.

results.description: Charmeleon is the evolved form of Charmander. It is more aggressive and has a larger flame on its tail.

results.name: Charizard

vitals.ability: Blaze: When HP is below 1/3, the power of Fire-type moves increases 1.5x.

results.description: Charizard is the final evolution of Charmander. It is a powerful dragon-like Pokémon capable of flying and breathing intense flames.

results.name: Squirtle

vitals.ability: Torrent: When HP is below 1/3, the power of Water-type moves increases 1.5x.

results.description: Squirtle is a small, turtle-like Pokémon. It can spray water from its mouth and retract into its shell for protection.

results.name: Wartortle

vitals.ability: Torrent: When HP is below 1/3, the power of Water-type moves increases 1.5x.

results.description: Wartortle is the evolved form of Squirtle. It has larger ears and a more robust shell, making it a formidable opponent.

results.name: Blastoise

vitals.ability: Torrent: When HP is below 1/3, the power of Water-type moves increases 1.5x.

results.description: Blastoise is the final evolution of Squirtle. It has powerful water cannons on its shell, capable of shooting water with incredible force.

results.name: Caterpie

vitals.ability: Shield Dust: Blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.

results.description: Caterpie is a small, worm-like Pokémon. It is covered in a green exoskeleton and has large, red antennae.

results.name: Metapod

vitals.ability: Shed Skin: May heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

results.description: Metapod is the evolved form of Caterpie. It remains motionless as it prepares to evolve, hardening its shell for protection.

results.name: Butterfree

vitals.ability: Compound Eyes: Increases the accuracy of moves used by the Pokémon.

results.description: Butterfree is the final evolution of Caterpie. It is known for its beautiful wings and its ability to scatter sleep-inducing scales.

results.name: Weedle

vitals.ability: Shield Dust: Blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.

results.description: Weedle is a small, worm-like Pokémon with a sharp stinger on its head. It is often found in forests and grasslands.

results.name: Kakuna

vitals.ability: Shed Skin: May heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

results.description: Kakuna is the evolved form of Weedle. It remains motionless, waiting for the moment to evolve into its next form.

results.name: Beedrill

vitals.ability: Swarm: Increases the power of Bug-type moves when HP is low.

results.description: Beedrill is the final evolution of Weedle. It is highly aggressive and uses its large stingers to attack its enemies.

results.name: Pidgey

vitals.ability: Keen Eye: Prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy.

results.description: Pidgey is a small, bird-like Pokémon. It is very common and can be found in many areas, often flying in flocks.

results.name: Pidgeotto

vitals.ability: Keen Eye: Prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy.

results.description: Pidgeotto is the evolved form of Pidgey. It is larger and more powerful, with sharp claws and a keen sense of sight.

results.name: Pidgeot

vitals.ability: Keen Eye: Prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy.

results.description: Pidgeot is the final evolution of Pidgey. It is a majestic bird Pokémon capable of flying at incredible speeds.

results.name: Rattata

vitals.ability: Run Away: Enables the Pokémon to flee from wild battles without fail.

results.description: Rattata is a small, rodent-like Pokémon. It is known for its quick movements and its tendency to reproduce rapidly.

results.name: Raticate

vitals.ability: Run Away: Enables the Pokémon to flee from wild battles without fail.

results.description: Raticate is the evolved form of Rattata. It is larger and more aggressive, with strong teeth capable of chewing through tough materials.

results.name: Spearow

vitals.ability: Keen Eye: Prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy.

results.description: Spearow is a small, bird-like Pokémon. It is known for its loud cries and aggressive behavior, often attacking intruders.

results.name: Fearow

vitals.ability: Keen Eye: Prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy.

results.description: Fearow is the evolved form of Spearow. It has a long neck and beak, which it uses to strike prey from a distance.

results.name: Ekans

vitals.ability: Intimidate: Lowers the opponent's Attack stat when the Pokémon enters battle.

results.description: Ekans is a snake-like Pokémon. It slithers silently and uses its fangs to inject venom into its prey.

results.name: Arbok

vitals.ability: Intimidate: Lowers the opponent's Attack stat when the Pokémon enters battle.

results.description: Arbok is the evolved form of Ekans. It has a menacing hood and can paralyze foes with its terrifying glare.

results.name: Pikachu

vitals.ability: Static: May paralyze the opponent when hit by a physical move.

results.description: Pikachu is an iconic Electric-type Pokémon. It stores electricity in its cheeks and can unleash powerful shocks.

results.name: Raichu

vitals.ability: Static: May paralyze the opponent when hit by a physical move.

results.description: Raichu is the evolved form of Pikachu. It is more powerful and can discharge large amounts of electricity.

results.name: Sandshrew

vitals.ability: Sand Veil: Increases evasion during a sandstorm.

results.description: Sandshrew is a small, ground-dwelling Pokémon. It curls into a ball to protect itself from attacks.

results.name: Sandslash

vitals.ability: Sand Veil: Increases evasion during a sandstorm.

results.description: Sandslash is the evolved form of Sandshrew. It has sharp claws and can roll into a spiky ball to attack foes.

results.name: Nidoran♀

vitals.ability: Poison Point: May poison the opponent when hit by a physical move.

results.description: Nidoran♀ is a small, rabbit-like Pokémon. It is highly territorial and uses its poison spikes for defense.

results.name: Nidorina

vitals.ability: Poison Point: May poison the opponent when hit by a physical move.

results.description: Nidorina is the evolved form of Nidoran♀. It is more protective of its young and uses its poison spikes to deter threats.

results.name: Nidoqueen

vitals.ability: Poison Point: May poison the opponent when hit by a physical move.

results.description: Nidoqueen is the final evolution of Nidoran♀. It is a powerful, tank-like Pokémon with a tough hide and strong attacks.

results.name: Nidoran♂

vitals.ability: Poison Point: May poison the opponent when hit by a physical move.

results.description: Nidoran♂ is a small, rabbit-like Pokémon. It is highly territorial and uses its poison spikes for defense.

results.name: Nidorino

vitals.ability: Poison Point: May poison the opponent when hit by a physical move.

results.description: Nidorino is the evolved form of Nidoran♂. It is more aggressive and uses its horn to attack foes.

results.name: Nidoking

vitals.ability: Poison Point: May poison the opponent when hit by a physical move.

results.description: Nidoking is the final evolution of Nidoran♂. It is a fearsome Pokémon with immense strength and a destructive horn.

results.name: Clefairy

vitals.ability: Cute Charm: May cause infatuation when hit by a physical move.

results.description: Clefairy is a small, pink Pokémon. It is said to come from the moon and is often seen dancing under its light.

results.name: Clefable

vitals.ability: Cute Charm: May cause infatuation when hit by a physical move.

results.description: Clefable is the evolved form of Clefairy. It is a rare Pokémon that avoids detection by living in quiet, remote areas.

results.name: Vulpix

vitals.ability: Flash Fire: Powers up Fire-type moves when hit by one.

results.description: Vulpix is a small, fox-like Pokémon. It has six tails that grow hotter as it evolves.

results.name: Ninetales

vitals.ability: Flash Fire: Powers up Fire-type moves when hit by one.

results.description: Ninetales is the evolved form of Vulpix. It is a mystical Pokémon with nine tails, said to live for a thousand years.

results.name: Jigglypuff

vitals.ability: Cute Charm: May cause infatuation when hit by a physical move.

results.description: Jigglypuff is a small, balloon-like Pokémon. It sings a soothing lullaby that can put anyone to sleep.

results.name: Wigglytuff

vitals.ability: Cute Charm: May cause infatuation when hit by a physical move.

results.description: Wigglytuff is the evolved form of Jigglypuff. It has a soft, stretchy body and is known for its soothing voice.

results.name: Zubat

vitals.ability: Inner Focus: Prevents flinching.

results.description: Zubat is a bat-like Pokémon. It uses echolocation to navigate in the dark and is often found in caves.

results.name: Golbat

vitals.ability: Inner Focus: Prevents flinching.

results.description: Golbat is the evolved form of Zubat. It is larger and more aggressive, often attacking prey with its sharp fangs.

results.name: Oddish

vitals.ability: Chlorophyll: Boosts Speed in sunny weather.

results.description: Oddish is a small, plant-like Pokémon. It buries itself in the ground during the day and comes out at night.

results.name: Gloom

vitals.ability: Chlorophyll: Boosts Speed in sunny weather.

results.description: Gloom is the evolved form of Oddish. It emits a foul odor from its mouth, which can cause fainting.

results.name: Vileplume

vitals.ability: Chlorophyll: Boosts Speed in sunny weather.

results.description: Vileplume is the final evolution of Oddish. It has a large, colorful flower that releases toxic pollen.

results.name: Paras

vitals.ability: Effect Spore: May inflict paralysis, poison, or sleep when hit by a physical move.

results.description: Paras is a small, insect-like Pokémon. It is controlled by the mushrooms on its back, which drain its energy.

results.name: Parasect

vitals.ability: Effect Spore: May inflict paralysis, poison, or sleep when hit by a physical move.

results.description: Parasect is the evolved form of Paras. The mushrooms on its back have completely taken over its body.

results.name: Venonat

vitals.ability: Compound Eyes: Increases accuracy of moves.

results.description: Venonat is a small, insect-like Pokémon. It has large eyes that can see in the dark and emits a strange powder.

results.name: Venomoth

vitals.ability: Shield Dust: Blocks additional effects of attacks.

results.description: Venomoth is the evolved form of Venonat. It has large wings that scatter toxic scales when it flaps them.

results.name: Diglett

vitals.ability: Sand Veil: Increases evasion during a sandstorm.

results.description: Diglett is a small, mole-like Pokémon. It lives underground and is rarely seen above the surface.

results.name: Dugtrio

vitals.ability: Sand Veil: Increases evasion during a sandstorm.

results.description: Dugtrio is the evolved form of Diglett. It consists of three Diglett working together to dig through the ground at incredible speeds.

results.name: Meowth

vitals.ability: Pickup: May pick up items after battle.

results.description: Meowth is a small, cat-like Pokémon. It is known for its love of shiny objects and its ability to use the move Pay Day.

results.name: Persian

vitals.ability: Limber: Prevents paralysis.

results.description: Persian is the evolved form of Meowth. It is a sleek and elegant Pokémon with a gem on its forehead.

results.name: Psyduck

vitals.ability: Damp: Prevents self-destructing moves.

results.description: Psyduck is a duck-like Pokémon. It is constantly plagued by headaches, which trigger its psychic powers.

results.name: Golduck

vitals.ability: Damp: Prevents self-destructing moves.

results.description: Golduck is the evolved form of Psyduck. It is a powerful swimmer and uses its psychic abilities to confuse foes.

results.name: Mankey

vitals.ability: Vital Spirit: Prevents sleep.

results.description: Mankey is a small, monkey-like Pokémon. It is easily angered and will attack anything that provokes it.

results.name: Primeape

vitals.ability: Vital Spirit: Prevents sleep.

results.description: Primeape is the evolved form of Mankey. It is incredibly aggressive and will chase down anyone who angers it.

results.name: Growlithe

vitals.ability: Intimidate: Lowers the opponent's Attack stat.

results.description: Growlithe is a small, dog-like Pokémon. It is loyal to its trainer and has a strong sense of smell.

results.name: Arcanine

vitals.ability: Intimidate: Lowers the opponent's Attack stat.

results.description: Arcanine is the evolved form of Growlithe. It is a majestic Pokémon known for its speed and fiery attacks.

results.name: Poliwag

vitals.ability: Water Absorb: Restores HP when hit by Water-type moves.

results.description: Poliwag is a small, tadpole-like Pokémon. It has a spiral pattern on its belly and is a strong swimmer.

results.name: Poliwhirl

vitals.ability: Water Absorb: Restores HP when hit by Water-type moves.

results.description: Poliwhirl is the evolved form of Poliwag. It has a more developed body and is capable of powerful punches.

results.name: Poliwrath

vitals.ability: Water Absorb: Restores HP when hit by Water-type moves.

results.description: Poliwrath is the evolved form of Poliwhirl. It is a powerful swimmer and uses its strength to defeat opponents.

results.name: Abra

vitals.ability: Synchronize: Passes status conditions to the opponent.

results.description: Abra is a small, fox-like Pokémon. It spends most of its time sleeping and can teleport away from danger.

results.name: Kadabra

vitals.ability: Synchronize: Passes status conditions to the opponent.

results.description: Kadabra is the evolved form of Abra. It wields a spoon to amplify its psychic powers and can read minds.

results.name: Alakazam

vitals.ability: Synchronize: Passes status conditions to the opponent.

results.description: Alakazam is the final evolution of Abra. It has an incredibly high IQ and can use its psychic powers to bend spoons.

results.name: Machop

vitals.ability: Guts: Increases Attack when affected by a status condition.

results.description: Machop is a small, humanoid Pokémon. It trains tirelessly to build its strength and master martial arts.

results.name: Machoke

vitals.ability: Guts: Increases Attack when affected by a status condition.

results.description: Machoke is the evolved form of Machop. It is incredibly strong and often helps humans with heavy lifting.

results.name: Machamp

vitals.ability: Guts: Increases Attack when affected by a status condition.

results.description: Machamp is the final evolution of Machop. It has four arms and can deliver powerful punches with incredible precision.

results.name: Bellsprout

vitals.ability: Chlorophyll: Boosts Speed in sunny weather.

results.description: Bellsprout is a small, plant-like Pokémon. It uses its roots to absorb nutrients and can spit acid to defend itself.

results.name: Weepinbell

vitals.ability: Chlorophyll: Boosts Speed in sunny weather.

results.description: Weepinbell is the evolved form of Bellsprout. It has a large mouth and uses its vine-like appendages to ensnare prey.

results.name: Victreebel

vitals.ability: Chlorophyll: Boosts Speed in sunny weather.

results.description: Victreebel is the final evolution of Bellsprout. It lures prey with its sweet scent and then dissolves them in its digestive fluids.

results.name: Tentacool

vitals.ability: Clear Body: Prevents stat reduction.

results.description: Tentacool is a jellyfish-like Pokémon. It drifts in the ocean and can paralyze foes with its stinging tentacles.

results.name: Tentacruel

vitals.ability: Clear Body: Prevents stat reduction.

results.description: Tentacruel is the evolved form of Tentacool. It has 80 tentacles that it uses to ensnare and poison its prey.

results.name: Geodude

vitals.ability: Rock Head: Prevents recoil damage.

results.description: Geodude is a small, rock-like Pokémon. It is often found in mountainous areas and can roll downhill at high speeds.

results.name: Graveler

vitals.ability: Rock Head: Prevents recoil damage.

results.description: Graveler is the evolved form of Geodude. It rolls down mountains to crush anything in its path and can explode when threatened.

results.name: Golem

vitals.ability: Rock Head: Prevents recoil damage.

results.description: Golem is the final evolution of Geodude. It has a hard, boulder-like body and can withstand powerful attacks.

results.name: Ponyta

vitals.ability: Run Away: Enables the Pokémon to flee from wild battles.

results.description: Ponyta is a horse-like Pokémon. Its mane and tail are made of fire, and it can jump incredibly high.

results.name: Rapidash

vitals.ability: Run Away: Enables the Pokémon to flee from wild battles.

results.description: Rapidash is the evolved form of Ponyta. It is incredibly fast and can reach speeds of up to 150 mph.

results.name: Slowpoke

vitals.ability: Oblivious: Prevents infatuation.

results.description: Slowpoke is a slow-moving Pokémon. It is often found near water and is known for its vacant expression.

results.name: Slowbro

vitals.ability: Oblivious: Prevents infatuation.

results.description: Slowbro is the evolved form of Slowpoke. A Shellder has latched onto its tail, giving it psychic powers.

results.name: Magnemite

vitals.ability: Magnet Pull: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping.

results.description: Magnemite is a small, magnet-like Pokémon. It floats in the air and uses electromagnetic waves to communicate.

results.name: Magneton

vitals.ability: Magnet Pull: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping.

results.description: Magneton is the evolved form of Magnemite. It consists of three Magnemite linked together, creating a powerful magnetic field.

results.name: Farfetch'd

vitals.ability: Keen Eye: Prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy.

results.description: Farfetch'd is a duck-like Pokémon. It carries a leek stalk, which it uses as a weapon and a cooking ingredient.

results.name: Doduo

vitals.ability: Run Away: Enables the Pokémon to flee from wild battles.

results.description: Doduo is a two-headed bird Pokémon. It can run at high speeds and uses its two heads to stay alert.

results.name: Dodrio

vitals.ability: Run Away: Enables the Pokémon to flee from wild battles.

results.description: Dodrio is the evolved form of Doduo. It has three heads and can run at incredible speeds across open plains.

results.name: Seel

vitals.ability: Thick Fat: Reduces damage from Fire and Ice moves.

results.description: Seel is a sea lion-like Pokémon. It thrives in cold environments and uses its horn to break through ice.

results.name: Dewgong

vitals.ability: Thick Fat: Reduces damage from Fire and Ice moves.

results.description: Dewgong is the evolved form of Seel. It is a graceful swimmer and can withstand freezing temperatures.

results.name: Grimer

vitals.ability: Stench: May cause the opponent to flinch.

results.description: Grimer is a sludge-like Pokémon. It thrives in polluted areas and leaves a trail of toxic waste wherever it goes.

results.name: Muk

vitals.ability: Stench: May cause the opponent to flinch.

results.description: Muk is the evolved form of Grimer. It is even more toxic and can cause severe illness with a single touch.

results.name: Shellder

vitals.ability: Shell Armor: Prevents critical hits.

results.description: Shellder is a bivalve-like Pokémon. It uses its hard shell to protect itself and can clamp down with great force.

results.name: Cloyster

vitals.ability: Shell Armor: Prevents critical hits.

results.description: Cloyster is the evolved form of Shellder. Its shell is incredibly hard, and it can fire spikes at its enemies.

results.name: Gastly

vitals.ability: Levitate: Grants immunity to Ground-type moves.

results.description: Gastly is a ghost-like Pokémon. It is made of toxic gas and can suffocate opponents by enveloping them.

results.name: Haunter

vitals.ability: Levitate: Grants immunity to Ground-type moves.

results.description: Haunter is the evolved form of Gastly. It lurks in the shadows and can lick its prey to steal their life force.

results.name: Gengar

vitals.ability: Levitate: Grants immunity to Ground-type moves.

results.description: Gengar is the final evolution of Gastly. It is a mischievous Pokémon that enjoys playing pranks on humans.

results.name: Onix

vitals.ability: Rock Head: Prevents recoil damage.

results.description: Onix is a massive, snake-like Pokémon. It burrows through the ground at high speeds and can cause earthquakes.

results.name: Drowzee

vitals.ability: Insomnia: Prevents sleep.

results.description: Drowzee is a tapir-like Pokémon. It feeds on the dreams of humans and Pokémon, often causing nightmares.

results.name: Hypno

vitals.ability: Insomnia: Prevents sleep.

results.description: Hypno is the evolved form of Drowzee. It uses a pendulum to hypnotize its prey and control their actions.

results.name: Krabby

vitals.ability: Hyper Cutter: Prevents Attack reduction.

results.description: Krabby is a crab-like Pokémon. It lives near beaches and uses its large pincers to defend itself.

results.name: Kingler

vitals.ability: Hyper Cutter: Prevents Attack reduction.

results.description: Kingler is the evolved form of Krabby. Its large pincer is incredibly strong and can crush boulders with ease.

results.name: Voltorb

vitals.ability: Soundproof: Grants immunity to sound-based moves.

results.description: Voltorb is a ball-like Pokémon. It is often mistaken for a Poké Ball and can explode when agitated.
